code: import React,{useState}from'react';import'../styles/RenovationManagement.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function RenovationManagement(){const[timeSlots,setTimeSlots]=useState([{day:'Monday',time:'10 AM - 12 PM',booked:false},{day:'Tuesday',time:'2 PM - 4 PM',booked:false},{day:'Wednesday',time:'1 PM - 3 PM',booked:false}]);const[selectedSlot,setSelectedSlot]=useState(null);const handleBooking=index=>{setTimeSlots(prevSlots=>prevSlots.map((slot,i)=>i===index?{...slot,booked:true}:slot));setSelectedSlot(timeSlots[index]);};const handleCancelBooking=()=>{if(window.confirm('Are you sure you want to cancel this booking?')){setTimeSlots(prevSlots=>prevSlots.map(slot=>slot===selectedSlot?{...slot,booked:false}:slot));setSelectedSlot(null);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"renovation-management",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"headerContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Renovation Management"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Book your renovation slots easily."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contentContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Available Time Slots"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"timeSlots",children:timeSlots.map((slot,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:slot.booked?'booked':'',children:[slot.day,": ",slot.time,!slot.booked?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleBooking(index),children:"Book"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:'red'},children:" (Booked)"})]},index))}),selectedSlot&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bookingInfo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Your Booking"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["You have booked a slot on ",selectedSlot.day," from ",selectedSlot.time,"."]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"cancel-button",onClick:handleCancelBooking,children:"Cancel Booking"})]})]})]});}export default RenovationManagement;
